Optional parameters for bundle creation.

```typescript
export interface IBundleCreateParams 
```

[hashNormalizer?](./ts-res.bundle.ibundlecreateparams.hashnormalizer.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Hash.HashingNormalizer


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional hash normalizer for generating checksums. If not provided, a CRC32 normalizer will be used for browser compatibility.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[normalize?](./ts-res.bundle.ibundlecreateparams.normalize.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to normalize the ResourceManagerBuilder before bundle creation. When true, the builder is reconstructed in canonical order to ensure order-independent checksums. Defaults to false for Phase 1 compatibility.


</td></tr>
